page.title: 18*House Renovation***********
page.content:
The house I used to live in was two houses befor my Dad knocked it through into one. If we hadn't have bought them they would have been demolished by my Grandad who owned a large building firm as my Uncle does now.
My Dad built two porches, one on the front and one on the back and he built new stairs. He then built an extension which is now a kitchen. The house all together has 10 rooms including the cloak room and utility room. It has 3 bedrooms, one bathroom, a sitting room, and a dining room.
Then Dad sold it and now we live in a very big house which is mostly derelict and all the walls are having to be knocked down and they are full of straw The house will be lovely when its finished. by Richard Michelson 10 Wri
